title: A covalent compound selectively inhibits RNA demethylase ALKBH5 rather than FTO
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,335-343
DOI: 10.1039/D3CB00230F, Paper
Open Access

Gan-Qiang Lai, Yali Li, Heping Zhu, Tao Zhang, Jing Gao, Hu Zhou, Cai-Guang Yang
We discovered that TD19 covalently and selectively inhibits ALKBH5 rather than FTO demethylase in both protein-based and tumor cell-based assays.
